transArray.content:
The location of the hotel is very good, just at the south gate of Qianmen Street, it is convenient to go anywhere.
There are not many varieties of breakfast. The reason for the relatively high occupancy rate is that there are a lot of things left in the hotel, and the service is not fast enough. The only few tastes are okay
The environment of the hotel lobby is not bad, you can receive guests and temporarily work,
The room is relatively small, and the window of the superior double room is also very small. The bathroom is above the standard, and there is a heated towel rack, which is good.
